title: Ekko Skin Concept (Sorry no pictures)
body:
Well, recently I've had a great epiphany, what if there was a **baseball-themed** Ekko skin? (Lil'Slugger Ekko??)

I think the concept would work well with Ekko's abilities, for example his Q could be him pitching the baseball and his W could be him hitting the ball with his bat.
idk, just a thought, let me know what you think! ^_^

replies.body:
Soccer lucian

Basket ball darius

Base ball ekko

We need a support and a jungler and two corresponding  sports
